prompt:
Parse the following resume content and output it in JSON format:

Osho Kothari
oshokothari@gmail.com
+919916678875
Bengaluru, India
linkedin.com/in/oshokothari
github.com/OshoKothari

EDUCATION
Amrita Vishwa Vidyapeetham,
Bachelors Of Technology - Computer Science and Engineering
2021 – 2025
Bengaluru, India

SKILLS
Programming: Python, JAVA, C++, SQL, Javascript, Dart, Flutter, ReactJS
Technologies: IoT, Embedded Systems, Web Development, Machine Learning, MS Excel
Soft Skills: Project Management, Problem Solving, Team Leadership

EXPERIENCE
Google Developer Student Clubs
Technical and Non-Technical Member
2023 – 2024
Bengaluru, India
•Technical Workshops: Organized and participated in various technical workshops to enhance developer skills and community engagement.

PROJECTS
Job Recession Prediction Using Machine Learning
•Objective: Developed predictive models to forecast economic recessions, aiding businesses in strategic planning.
•Tech Stack: Python, ML
•Key Contributions: Implemented data preprocessing techniques, built and evaluated multiple machine learning models, and achieved an accuracy of 85% on test data.

Real-Time Accident Detection Using LoRa Technology
•Objective: A robust system to detect vehicular accidents in remote hilly regions using LoRa technology.
•Tech Stack: IoT, Embedded C, Arduino
•Key Contributions: Developed the embedded system software, integrated sensor data collection, and ensured reliable long-range communication.

CI/CD Automation
•Objective: Automated the software development lifecycle to enhance deployment efficiency and reduce human error by detecting errors using Sonarqube
•Tech Stack: Jenkins, Git, AWS, Web Development
•Key Contributions: Configured Jenkins pipelines, automated testing, and deployed applications seamlessly to AWS.

Weather App
•Objective: Created a user-friendly weather app offering real-time weather updates and a 3-day forecast.
•Tech Stack: Flutter, Dart, OpenWeather API
•Key Contributions: Developed the user interface, integrated API for live data, and implemented additional features like location-based weather updates.

PUBLICATIONS
Forecasting India’s Air Quality: A Machine Learning Approach, Published in CONIT
Diabetic Retinopathy using OCT Images, Published in ICCCNT
Securing Images: A Cryptographic Approach and Algorithm Analysis, Published in ICCCNT

AWARDS & ACHIEVEMENTS
3rd Prize at Cook with Prompt, Reva University
Top 10 teams in HackOdisha 3.0, Webwiz, Nit Rourkela
Honorable Mentions at Code Quest, Glug & Robotics Club Reva University
1st Rank at The Everything Quiz, Amrita School Of Engineering

mailto:oshokothari@gmail.com
tel:+919916678875
https://www.linkedin.com/in/oshokothari/
https://github.com/OshoKothari
